channel.title: I need help with my mac
channel.description:
please help me fix my compiler for my server. i have a mac, adn this is what i have:
ok so i switched my compiler to compiler.term, and this is what's inside:
[Code] @echo off title ZymusScape Compiler /System/Library/Frameworks/Java.VM.framework/Versions/1.5.0/Commands/javac.exec -cp . *.java /System/Library/Frameworks/Java.VM.framework/Versions/1.5.0/Commands/java.exe server pause[/code]
and when i run it i get this error:
[Quote] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Bot [Process exited - exit code 1][/quote]
and this is the command i use:
[code] java -cp MoparScape32.jar; Bot[/code]

item.title: I need help with my mac
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

man macs are like, the mercedes of computers. partly, like you said, there aren’t many viruses for them.

item.title: I need help with my mac
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

please help me fix my compiler for my server. i have a mac, adn this is what i have:

ok so i switched my compiler to compiler.term, and this is what’s inside:

@echo off title ZymusScape Compiler /System/Library/Frameworks/Java.VM.framework/Versions/1.5.0/Commands/javac.exec -cp . *.java /System/Library/Frameworks/Java.VM.framework/Versions/1.5.0/Commands/java.exe server pause

and when i run it i get this error:

[Quote]
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Bot
[Process exited - exit code 1][/quote]

and this is the command i use:

java -cp MoparScape32.jar; Bot
